title: Behind the scenes in the fight against COVID-19 - CBC.ca
description: Behind the scenes in the fight against COVID-19 CBC.ca Canadian-made rapid COVID-19 test approved for use | Power & Politics CBC News Refugee shelter in Toronto reports outbreak of COVID-19 CBC News Managing risk to get closer to the COVID-19 story CBC.ca Ins…
content:
COVID-19 is showing its callousness again and again.
In the ICU at Humber River Hospital in Toronto is a man on a ventilator who's really struggling.
When he first arrived, his breathing was so laboured there were only minutes to decide he needed to be intu… [+5315 chars]
